meanings.sent1: The little kitten let out a soft miaow.
meanings.sent2: I heard a loud miaow coming from the neighbor's yard.
meanings.sent3: The miaow of the cat woke up the whole house early in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The lonely miaow echoed through the empty alley.
meanings.sent5: The familiar miaow of my pet always brings a smile to my face.

meanings.definition: To make the sound of a cat.
meanings.sent1: When the cat wants attention, it will miaow loudly.
meanings.sent2: I often miaow back at my cat to communicate with her.
meanings.sent3: I tried to miaow like a cat, but it just made my friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The wind made the trees miaow softly in the night.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice miaowed in a unique and captivating way.

meanings.sent1: The miaow of the stray cat outside tugged at my heartstrings.
meanings.sent2: I recognized my cat's miaow among all the other sounds in the room.
meanings.sent3: The miaow of the cat interrupted the silence of the night.
meanings.sent4: The miaow of the cat was like a melody in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The loud miaow of the cat startled the birds nearby.
